column4: does anyone know how to get an install cd to start during boot, disc drive is the first thing to start, and disc was burned properly at a low speed as an .iso image? I need help getting it to start up

some motherboards and bios's make you hit F2 or something on boot to choose what you want to boot.  This is a notorious thing for Dell which is why I asked.. even with the cdrom in 1st postition Dell want everyone to use that utility
